name: Kepler22
description:
Matheus gets teleported to Kepler22, a distant planet. He should do a routine inspection but he finds a nasty surprise !

A gameplay rich open world first person shooter where you can fight the alien enemies, explore the vast land of kepler 22, dedicate yourself to secondary missions full of old school puzzles, find collectibles, enjoy the versatility of the harpoon of your bionic arm.

  • 11 buildings to explore
  • 3 secondary missions
  • 10+ hours of fun
  • Integrated walkthrough (in English) and help movies
  • Achievements and statistics
  • Supports 6 languages:
    • English
    • Spanish
    • German
    • Italian
    • Franch
    • Japanese

Available for Windows and Mac

This is a single-man work and it took to me nearly 3 years to make this game.

I tried to make the gameplay as varied as possible without moving too far from the established expectations of an fps player. Hope everyone enjoys !

Giune/16/2017

Fixed a couple of bugs. One of them could prevent the completition of the stealth mission. If you are in trouble please update.

NOTE: If anyone is frustrated by th stealth mission it's good to know that if you fail a few times to pass a room, you are then given an option to skip it.
